metadata.title: CVE-2020-11078 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
In httplib2 before version 0.18.0, an attacker controlling unescaped partof uri for `httplib2.Http.request()` could change request headers and body,send additional hidden requests to same server. This vulnerability impactssoftware that uses httplib2 with uri constructed by string concatenation,as opposed to proper urllib building with escaping. This has been fixed in0.18.0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11078` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-httplib2 - 0.18.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-httplib2 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.1-1').
